name: Don't Get Hit (spinner-web)
description:
Welcome to my small game for the Trijam #202, with the theme "Free-for-all".

Gameplay:

Try to dodge the bullets for as long as you can, while also escaping your enemies. 

The red bullets can hit and bounce off the walls.The blue bullets ignore the walls.

Control:

WASD or Keyboard cursors to move your player.

Background / Game Idea:
It took me a while to think of a good idea and even needed two attempts to the current result. The issue was that I wanted to have a fair fight against enemies, but this is quite hard since the AI needs to be built which takes time.  For this game, there are now some enemies, but the big fight is rather against the bullets, so not 100% as I wanted it to be, but with the limited time all I could do.

I hope it is still fun, looking forward to your comments (and feel free to share your records :)). 

Enjoy :)

Assets used:

  • Graphics: 
    • https://craftpix.net/product/rpg-character-sprite-sheet-generator/
    • https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-battle-location-top-down-game-tileset-pack-1/
  • Music: https://motionarray.com/royalty-free-music/dark-movie-77561/
